arts.ttl: Aston Villa vs Fulham team news LIVE!
arts.sum: “We need to get at them and show that we can beat them, because I’m 100 per cent sure that if we play our best we can get those three points. Joachim Andersen is wary of an Aston Villa backlash for Fulham on Sunday when the two sides meet in the Premier League at Villa Park.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa vs Fulham – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Aston Villa will be desperate to secure their first Premier League win of the season on Sunday when they host an in-form Fulham at Villa Park. Unai Emery’s side are winless in their opening five games and sit in the relegation zone. arts.ttl: Aston Villa vs Fulham predictions: First Premier League win coming for Villa
arts.sum: Aston Villa have endured a dismal start to the new Premier League season, but Ross Kilvington expects them to put a first win on the board when they play host to Fulham.
